Title: The Contingency
Writer: Jonathan Nolan (created by), Denise ThÃ©, Jonathan Nolan, Sean Hennen (story editor), Erik Mountain (story editor)
Actors: Jim Caviezel, Taraji P. Henson, Kevin Chapman, Michael Emerson
Plot: Mr. Reese breaks Finch's code of communicating with the Machine in order to save the new number, Leon, who stole money from some Aryan outlaws. He then convinces the Machine to help him find Finch.
